PrecisAuthority to extend the duration of a CONTRACT between the Crown and PMG TECHNOLOGIES INC. concerning the loan of certain Crown property used in connection with the operation and maintenance of the MOTOR VEHICLE TEST CENTRE at Blainville, Quebec, for a period of fifteen months.
